title: Purpose
verses: Jeremiah 29:11 (WEB) — “Plans to give you hope and a future.”
Romans 8:28 (WEB) — “All things work together for good for those who love God.”
Micah 6:8 (WEB) — “Act justly, love mercy, walk humbly.”
Proverbs 16:9 (WEB) — “A man’s heart plans his course, but Yahweh directs his steps.”
body: Purpose is discovered in relationship with God and service to people. Start where you are—do the next right thing in love—and trust God to steer you.
prayer: Author of my days, lead me into the good works You prepared. Align my gifts with real needs and make my life a blessing. Amen.
